name: Dungeon Roller!
description:
Dungeon Roller! is a game made for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam. Following the theme of "Roll of the dice!", we ventured into creating a simple but fun game about a goblin adventuring inside a dungeon, with nothing but his lucky dice and some available weapons. 

The game's math-based combat system mixes strategy with just enough luck to make you think through every decision when facing our fun monsters.

See how far your luck takes you, and let us know in the comments!
